page.title: 18Children's clubs -Beckermet
page.content: There are lots of clubs in the village for children. Girls from 8 to 10 years of age can attend Brownies. They start after school at 3 o'clock. They play games and sometimes go camping. Boys between the ages of 6 and 8 can join Beavers. This club is held in the school hall. Their leader is called White Eagle. When they are 9 these children become Cubs and when they are older, Scouts. Netball is an interesting game for the girls. They learn a lot of ball skills. A lot of children attend Gymnasium Club.They take skill tests for the B.A.G.A. Awards.
